career_description: Entry-level position focusing on learning backend development with Python and Django. Work on bug fixes and simple feature implementations under senior guidance.
Build and maintain REST APIs using Django/DRF. Handle database operations and implement business logic. 1-2 years experience or strong fundamentals required.
Specialize in designing and building RESTful APIs. Focus on API documentation and integration with third-party services. Strong understanding of HTTP and REST principles needed.
Full-stack Django development including models views and templates. Build web applications from scratch. Requires solid Django and Python fundamentals.
Production-ready backend development. Handle database optimization and caching and performance tuning. Expected to write scalable and maintainable code.
